languages.text:
Вы получили новые предметы! Все предметы находятся в инвентаре — открыть инвентарь можно через сервисное меню, зажав {console_bind|RightBottom}, выбрав иконку инвентаря с помощью {console_bind|DPadFull} и отпустив {console_bind|RightBottom}.
Оружие, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и другие предметы можно экипировать на персонажей или иначе взаимодействовать с ними. С помощью {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплекта{/g} можно пополнять {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} и исцелять {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранения{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Вы получили новые предметы! Все предметы находятся в инвентаре — открыть инвентарь можно через сервисное меню, зажав {console_bind|RightBottom}.
Оружие, броню и другие предметы можно экипировать на персонажей или иначе взаимодействовать с ними. С помощью медкомплекта можно пополнять здоровье и исцелять ранения.

languages.text:
You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it from quick access by holding {console_bind|RightBottom}, selecting the inventory icon using {console_bind|DPadFull}, and then releasing {console_bind|RightBottom}.
Weapons, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in some other way. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Вы получили новые предметы! Все предметы находятся в инвентаре — открыть инвентарь можно через сервисное меню, зажав {console_bind|RightBottom}, выбрав иконку инвентаря с помощью {console_bind|DPadFull} и отпустив {console_bind|RightBottom}.
Оружие, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и другие предметы можно экипировать на персонажей или иначе взаимодействовать с ними. С помощью {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплекта{/g} можно пополнять {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} и исцелять {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранения{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it from quick access by holding {console_bind|RightBottom}, selecting the inventory icon using {console_bind|DPad}, then releasing {console_bind|RightBottom}.
Weapons, armour, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in some other way. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.

You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it from quick access by holding {console_bind|RightBottom}, selecting the inventory icon using {console_bind|DPad}, and then releasing {console_bind|RightBottom}.
Weapons, armour, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in some other way. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.

You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it from quick access by holding {console_bind|RightBottom}, selecting the inventory icon using {console_bind|DPadFull}, and then releasing {console_bind|RightBottom}.
Weapons, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in some other way. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.

You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it from quick access by holding {console_bind|RightBottom}, selecting the inventory icon using {console_bind|DPadFull}, and then releasing {console_bind|RightBottom}.
Weapons, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in some other way. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.

languages.text:
¡Has conseguido objetos nuevos! Todos los objetos se añaden a tu inventario. Ábrelo desde el acceso rápido manteniendo {console_bind|RightBottom}, eligiendo el icono de inventario con {console_bind|DPadFull} y soltando {console_bind|RightBottom}.
El procedimiento para equipar o interactuar con armas, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armaduras{/g} y otros objetos es distinto. Los {g|ib:Medikit}botiquines{/g} pueden usarse para sanar {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} y tratar {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g}.
languages.original_text:
You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it from quick access by holding {console_bind|RightBottom}, selecting the inventory icon using {console_bind|DPadFull}, and then releasing {console_bind|RightBottom}.
Weapons, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in some other way. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
¡Has conseguido objetos nuevos! Todos los objetos se añaden a tu inventario. Ábrelo desde el acceso rápido manteniendo {console_bind|RightBottom}, eligiendo el icono de inventario con {console_bind|DPad} y soltando {console_bind|RightBottom}.
El procedimiento para equipar o interactuar con armas, {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armaduras{/g} y otros objetos es distinto. Los {g|ib:Medikit}botiquines{/g} pueden usarse para sanar {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} y tratar {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g}.

languages.text:
新しいアイテムを手に入れた！アイテムはすべてインベントリに追加される。{console_bind|RightBottom}を押しながら{console_bind|DPadFull}でインベントリアイコンを選択し、{console_bind|RightBottom}を離すとクイックアクセスから開くことができる。
武器、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}、その他のアイテムは、他の方法で装備したり操作できる。{g|ib:Medikit}メディキット{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の回復と{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}の治療に使用できる。
languages.original_text:
You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it from quick access by holding {console_bind|RightBottom}, selecting the inventory icon using {console_bind|DPadFull}, and then releasing {console_bind|RightBottom}.
Weapons, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in some other way. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
新しいアイテムを手に入れた！アイテムはすべてインベントリに追加される。{console_bind|RightBottom}を押しながら{console_bind|DPad}でインベントリアイコンを選択し、{console_bind|RightBottom}を離すとクイックアクセスから開くことができる。
武器、{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}、その他のアイテムは、他の方法で装備したり操作できる。{g|ib:Medikit}メディキット{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の回復と{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}怪我{/g}の治療に使用できる。

languages.text:
您获得了新物品！所有物品都会添加到您的物品栏中。您可以按住{console_bind|RightBottom}打开快速访问菜单，之后通过{console_bind|DPadFull}选择物品栏图标，之后松开{console_bind|RightBottom}。
武器、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与其它物品可以进行装备或通过其他方式进行互动。{g|ib:Medikit}医疗包{/g}可以用来恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，治疗{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}。
languages.original_text:
You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it from quick access by holding {console_bind|RightBottom}, selecting the inventory icon using {console_bind|DPadFull}, and then releasing {console_bind|RightBottom}.
Weapons, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in some other way. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
您获得了新物品！所有物品都会添加到您的物品栏中。您可以按住{console_bind|RightBottom}打开快速访问菜单，之后通过{console_bind|DPad}选择物品栏图标，之后松开{console_bind|RightBottom}。
武器、{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}与其它物品可以通过其他方式进行互动。{g|ib:Medikit}医疗包{/g}可以用来恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，治疗{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}。

languages.text:
Du hast neue Gegenstände erhalten! Alle Gegenstände werden deinem Inventar hinzugefügt. Du kannst sie über den Schnellzugriff öffnen, indem du {console_bind|RightBottom} gedrückt hältst, das Inventarsymbol mit {console_bind|DPadFull} auswählst und dann {console_bind|RightBottom} loslässt.
Waffen, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstungen{/g} und andere Gegenstände können ausgerüstet werden, oder sind auf andere Weise interagierbar. Mit {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} kannst du {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} wieder auffüllen und {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g} heilen.
languages.original_text:
You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it from quick access by holding {console_bind|RightBottom}, selecting the inventory icon using {console_bind|DPadFull}, and then releasing {console_bind|RightBottom}.
Weapons, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in some other way. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Du hast neue Gegenstände erhalten! Alle Gegenstände werden deinem Inventar hinzugefügt. Du kannst sie über den Schnellzugriff öffnen, indem du {console_bind|RightBottom} gedrückt hältst, das Inventarsymbol mit {console_bind|DPad} auswählst und dann {console_bind|RightBottom} loslässt.
Waffen, {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstungen{/g} und andere Gegenstände können ausgerüstet werden, oder sind auf andere Weise interagierbar. Mit {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} kannst du {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} wieder auffüllen und {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g} heilen.

languages.text:
Vous avez obtenu de nouveaux objets ! Tous les objets sont ajoutés à votre inventaire. Pour l'ouvrir à partir de l'accès rapide, appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|RightBottom}, sélectionnez l'icône de l'inventaire à l'aide de {console_bind|DPadFull}, puis relâchez {console_bind|RightBottom}.
Les armes, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armures{/g} et autres objets peuvent être utilisés d'une autre manière. Les {g|ib:Medikit}médikits{/g} permettent de régénérer la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} et de soigner les {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésions{/g}.
languages.original_text:
You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it from quick access by holding {console_bind|RightBottom}, selecting the inventory icon using {console_bind|DPadFull}, and then releasing {console_bind|RightBottom}.
Weapons, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in some other way. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Vous avez obtenu de nouveaux objets ! Tous les objets sont ajoutés à votre inventaire. Pour l'ouvrir à partir de l'accès rapide, appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|RightBottom}, sélectionnez l'icône de l'inventaire à l'aide de {console_bind|DPad}, puis relâchez {console_bind|RightBottom}.
Les armes, {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armures{/g} et autres objets peuvent être utilisés d'une autre manière. Les {g|ib:Medikit}médikits{/g} permettent de rétablir la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} et de soigner les {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}blessures{/g}.

languages.text:
Yeni eşyalar elde ettin! Edindiğin tüm eşyalar envanterine eklenir. Envanterini hızlı erişimden, {console_bind|RightBottom} düğmesini basılı tutup {console_bind|DPadFull} ile envanter simgesini seçerek, sonra da {console_bind|RightBottom} düğmesini bırakarak açabilirsin.
Envanter ekranında silah, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve diğer eşyaları kuşanabilir veya onlarla başka şekillerde etkileşime girebilirsin. {g|ib:Medikit}Sıhhiye çantaları{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} tazelemekte ve {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlıkları{/g} tedavi etmekte kullanılabilir.
languages.original_text:
You have gotten new items! All items are added to your inventory. You can open it from quick access by holding {console_bind|RightBottom}, selecting the inventory icon using {console_bind|DPadFull}, and then releasing {console_bind|RightBottom}.
Weapons, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and other items can be equipped or interacted with in some other way. {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} can be used to replenish {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and heal {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.
